statements: SELECT id, strategy_name, exposure, portfolio_performance FROM RiskManagementSystem;
SELECT strategy_name, exposure, portfolio_performance, id FROM RiskManagementSystem;
SELECT id, strategy_name FROM RiskManagementSystem;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementSystem WHERE id = 1;
SELECT strategy_name, exposure FROM RiskManagementSystem WHERE portfolio_performance > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementSystem WHERE exposure > 5000 ORDER BY portfolio_performance DESC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, exposure FROM RiskManagementSystem WHERE portfolio_performance < 0.5;
SELECT strategy_name, SUM(exposure) AS total_exposure FROM RiskManagementSystem GROUP BY strategy_name HAVING total_exposure > 10000;
SELECT strategy_name, AVG(portfolio_performance) AS avg_performance FROM RiskManagementSystem GROUP BY strategy_name ORDER BY avg_performance DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementSystem WHERE strategy_name LIKE 'Conservative%' AND exposure < 5000;
SELECT * FROM MarketMicrostructureRiskManagement;
SELECT id, exposure FROM MarketMicrostructureRiskManagement WHERE exposure > 1000;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM MarketParticipants WHERE trading_capacity = 'High';
SELECT * FROM MarketParticipants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT id, portfolio_performance FROM MarketMicrostructureRiskManagement ORDER BY portfolio_performance ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketMicrostructureRiskManagement WHERE exposure > 100 ORDER BY portfolio_performance DESC;
SELECT id, exposure, portfolio_performance FROM MarketMicrostructureRiskManagement WHERE portfolio_performance < 50;
SELECT id, exposure, portfolio_performance FROM MarketMicrostructureRiskManagement WHERE exposure BETWEEN 50 AND 150;
SELECT * FROM MarketParticipants WHERE trading_capacity = 'High' ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM MarketParticipants WHERE participant_id > 100 ORDER BY participant_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Market_Microstructure_Risks;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, exposure FROM Market_Microstructure_Risks WHERE exposure > 100;
SELECT entity_name, exposure FROM Market_Microstructure_Risks ORDER BY entity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio_Performance WHERE total_value > 50000;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, price FROM Trade_Records WHERE quantity > 1000;
SELECT entity_id, entity_name, exposure FROM Market_Microstructure_Risks;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio_Performance ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, price FROM Trade_Records WHERE entity_id = 1001;
SELECT entity_name, exposure, entity_id FROM Market_Microstructure_Risks WHERE exposure > 1000;
SELECT portfolio_name, total_value FROM Portfolio_Performance WHERE total_value BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY total_value ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementSystem;
SELECT id, exposure, risk_score FROM RiskManagementSystem ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT client_id, SUM(exposure) AS total_exposure FROM RiskManagementSystem GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE performance > 0.5;
SELECT security_id, AVG(market_price) AS average_market_price FROM MarketMicrostructure GROUP BY security_id ORDER BY average_market_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskManagementSystem ORDER BY exposure DESC, risk_score ASC, client_id;
SELECT client_id, SUM(exposure) AS total_exposure FROM RiskManagementSystem GROUP BY client_id HAVING total_exposure > 100000;
SELECT security_id, AVG(market_price) AS average_price FROM MarketMicrostructure GROUP BY security_id ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT client_id, exposure_rating FROM RiskManagementSystem JOIN ExposureAnalysis ON RiskManagementSystem.id = ExposureAnalysis.analysis_id WHERE exposure_rating = 'High';
SELECT portfolio_id, MAX(performance) AS max_performance FROM PortfolioPerformance GROUP BY portfolio_id HAVING MAX(performance) > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM exposure;
SELECT id, portfolio_id, risk_level FROM exposure WHERE risk_level > 5;
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM market_data ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT  id, risk_type, value FROM risk_metrics WHERE risk_type = 'Market Risk';
SELECT id, name, strategy FROM portfolio WHERE manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, risk_level, portfolio_id FROM exposure WHERE risk_level > 5;
SELECT id, returns, date FROM performance ORDER BY returns DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM market_data WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT id, risk_type, value FROM risk_metrics WHERE value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.5;
SELECT id, name, manager, strategy FROM portfolio;
